scores.tweet_text: Hey @obi, @fulmolightning, @lucas_lclc, @LayahHeilpern, @zackvoell, @GoingParabolic, @novogratz, @DanielKrawisz, @coryklippsten, and @CoinCornerDanny. Pls check out the free, open source, expert-curated tool with fixed urls to misconception & answers?: blockchainbird.org/t/btc

I've followed @OneBitTouch, @emmacrypto, @Fullbeerbottle, @bbands, @girlgone_crypto, @cryptonator1337, @CryptoEuclid, @KoroushAK, and @fintechfrank a while, but I have not seen them using the free, open source misconception tool with fixed urls blockchainbird.org/t/btc/
